type.description: The type of the container file citation. Always `container_file_citation`.

container_id.description: The ID of the container file.

start_index.description: The index of the first character of the container file citation in the message.

end_index.description: The index of the last character of the container file citation in the message.

filename.description: The filename of the container file cited.

title: Container file citation
description: A citation for a container file used to generate a model response.
